company.name: Lenskart Solutions Limited
company.tagline: Tech-driven eyewear retail & direct-to-consumer eyewear solutions in India
company.about: Lenskart is a technology-driven eyewear company offering prescription eyeglasses, sunglasses, contact lenses and eyewear accessories online and via retail stores across India. Founded in 2010, it combines online convenience with physical stores to deliver affordable and quality eyewear directly to consumers.
company.industry: Eyewear retail, contact lenses, sunglasses, prescription glasses, accessories

faq_entries.question: What does Lenskart do?
faq_entries.answer: Lenskart sells prescription eyeglasses, sunglasses, contact lenses and related eyewear accessories via website, mobile app and retail stores. They provide ready-made frames and also custom-lens options with prescription, using automated labs for precise lens manufacturing.

faq_entries.question: Who can use Lenskart?
faq_entries.answer: Anyone looking for affordable eyewear — prescription glasses, sunglasses, contact lenses or accessories. Lenskart serves customers across ages and needs, from fashion eyewear seekers to people needing vision correction.

faq_entries.question: Can Lenskart make glasses with my prescription?
faq_entries.answer: Yes. Lenskart can make prescription lenses including single vision, bifocal and progressive lenses. You can upload or submit your prescription and they will manufacture lenses to the specified power.

faq_entries.question: I don't have my prescription right now — can I order?
faq_entries.answer: Yes. You can place an order for frames and provide your prescription later by uploading an image or entering details after purchase.

faq_entries.question: What if my glasses don't fit or lenses are wrong?
faq_entries.answer: Lenskart offers return/exchange options within the eligible period for most products. If the product is faulty or the lenses are incorrect, follow the returns/exchange flow on the site or contact customer support.

faq_entries.question: How much do your products cost? Do you have fixed pricing?
faq_entries.answer: Pricing varies widely by frame style, lens type and prescription. There is no single fixed price; exact costs depend on choices you make (frame, lens coatings, add-ons). For current prices, check the product page or add items to cart for live pricing.

faq_entries.question: How can I try frames or get help?
faq_entries.answer: You can visit a Lenskart retail store to try frames, or use the online fitting tools and customer service channels available on the website and app.
